content: Frankly, the notion that a rich person’s compound interest on his wealth is taking money out of the economy is embarrassing to anybody who feels qualified to write on economic topics. Unless the rich guy is stuffing that money under a mattress, it gets invested and circulates through the economy. Even if the rich dude stuffs the money under a mattress, it doesn’t take wealth out of the economy because it makes the existing dollars in the economy more valuable via deflation.
